## Make chart in R

```{r}
# CCI Blacklight data
data <- data.frame(
  name=letters[1:5],
  value=sample(seq(4,150),5)
)

barplot(height=data$value, names=data$name, col=rgb(0.2,0.4,0.2,0.6),
        xlab="Order",
        ylab="# present",
        main="Insects at blacklight",
        ylim=c(0, 200)
        )

```
